results.title: Crypto wallet provider Payy launches privacy-focused Ethereum L2
results.description: Payy’s new privacy layer 2 makes every ERC-20 transfer private by default without the need for new wallets or tokens.

results.description: Social media sentiment has turned “extremely bearish” toward Bitcoin and Ethereum this week, according to analytics platform Santiment.

results.title: Bitcoin Extends Selloff as Macro Pressures and Leverage Unwind
results.description: The latest decline reflects a broader unwind in leverage, with investors reassessing Bitcoin’s short-term role as an inflation hedge.

results.title: CFTC pulls Biden-era proposal to ban sports, political prediction markets

results.title: Kyle Samani leaves Multicoin in ‘bittersweet moment’ to explore new tech

results.description: Bitcoin’s 12-day ETF outflows, derivatives data and the crypto market in tandem trading with tech stocks suggest traders will continue to cut exposure to risk assets.

results.title: CME CEO Duffy says exchange is exploring issuing its own token

results.title: Anthropic Trolls OpenAI's ChatGPT in Super Bowl Ad Campaign
results.description: Claude AI developer Anthropic is using the Super Bowl to mock OpenAI’s planned shift toward ads in ChatGPT—in front of a global audience.

results.title: Telegram's Durov slams Spain's online age verification proposal
results.description: The proposed laws are meant to create a mass-surveillance state and are not about protecting children, Pavel Durov warned on Wednesday.

results.title: CME Explores Launching Its Own Coin as 24/7 Trading for Crypto Funds Nears
results.description: CME Group is looking at launching its own coin on a decentralized network, while moving crypto products to 24/7 trading as volumes jump 92%.

results.description: Ethereum crypto game Axie Infinity is introducing a new token that will be airdropped to stakers and those who play its upcoming land game.

results.title: Alleged Bitcoin Ransom Deepens Mystery in Nancy Guthrie Disappearance
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Alleged Bitcoin Ransom Deepens Mystery in Nancy Guthrie Disappearance The search for 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie has escalated after TMZ reported receiving an alleged ransom note demanding millions in Bitcoin, complete with a deadline, threats of harm, and a verified wallet address.
